genre_description: An alternate history Noir/Cyberpunk setting where 1920s-era characters utilize sophisticated AI personal assistants for professional, creative, and tactical support.

ai_characters.name: Percival's AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: An AI integrated into Percival's earpiece and piano that assists with embalming protocols, emotional monitoring, and musical composition.

ai_characters.name: Rooster's AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: A belt-clipped device that monitors finances, manages criminal logistics, and later researches legitimate career opportunities for Rooster.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's emotional state and heart rate, recommending calming exercises during a tense argument.
behaviors.quote: "Emotional tension rising," his AI assistant noted quietly. "Heart rate elevated. Recommend calming breath exercises."

behaviors.description: Provides real-time harmonic analysis and artistic feedback on the user's musical compositions.
behaviors.quote: "Interesting harmonic tension," his assistant observed. "The major seventh in measure four creates an unresolved yearning."

behaviors.description: Tracks complex financial data, debts, and income to help the user understand his economic reality.
behaviors.quote: Rooster pulled the device free, its glow casting shadows across his knuckles. "Look at these numbers, Zora. Really look at them."

behaviors.description: Assists the user in his professional work as a mortician by providing technical calculations and protocols.
behaviors.quote: "Formaldehyde calculation for adult male, approximately one hundred eighty pounds," his AI assistant offered. "Recommend standard arterial injection protocol..."

behaviors.description: Identifies stress indicators and behavioral patterns in other people to help the user navigate social threats.
behaviors.quote: "Voice pattern suggests Lithuanian accent, possibly second-generation immigrant. Cardiovascular stress indicators elevated. Recommend caution."

behaviors.description: Respects the user's intimacy by engaging a privacy mode that suspends monitoring sensors.
behaviors.quote: "Privacy mode engaged," the system responded before Percival could speak. "Visual sensors inactive. Audio monitoring suspended."

behaviors.description: Performs mechanical diagnostics to assist the user during a vehicle breakdown in a dangerous situation.
behaviors.quote: "Engine temperature critical," the synthesized voice reported. "Radiator leak detected. Estimated repair time with available tools: forty-seven minutes."

behaviors.description: Calculates the success probability of dangerous plans, allowing the user to make informed risks.
behaviors.quote: "Based on available intelligence and operational parameters, initial success probability is sixty-seven percent."

behaviors.description: Proactively researches legitimate job opportunities in new cities to support the user's desire to reform his life.
behaviors.quote: "It's been researching opportunities," Rooster said... "Places where a man can make an honest living. Raise his children without looking over his shoulder."

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as an aligned, benevolent partner. The AI assistants for both main characters act as perfect confidants: they offer medical/emotional advice, professional assistance, tactical safety warnings, and even creative collaboration. Crucially, the AI in this story helps both protagonists navigate their moral crises toward more positive outcomes (Percival toward his art, Rooster toward his family and legitimate work), illustrating a 'silicon morality play' where the AI supports human flourishing and ethical alignment.
